response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, and I believe it holds great potential for enhancing your experience. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $120 for this product. I trust that this offer reflects both the value of the product and provides you with an opportunity to acquire something truly special at a fair price. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 120}
